Reviews.Title: The connector
Reviews.Author: trinetta
Reviews.Content: It connected 2 short cords together and it made my cameras to be able to work, now I have 8 camera on duty.

Reviews.Title: Works well when using extension RJ12 cables
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: This RJ12 coupler has been used to extend the length of a 60ft cable coupled to a 40ft cable to make a solid 100ft cable w/o purchasing a whole new 100ft cable. It has worked well so far...camera picture and audio quality is exceptional-no loss of resolution.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Stixmen
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised, cheaper than having to purchase from manufacture. suggest taping ends into coupler if using outside to keep water out.

ProductInfo.Features:
RJ12 cable extension coupler
Quickly connect two RJ12 cables together
Simple and efficient design
ProductInfo.Name: Revo RRJ12COUP RJ12 Coupler
